post.summary: Search recipe by title or ingredient

requestBody.description: search recipe by name or ingredient

favorites.description: array of users , who aded recipe to favorites

likes.description: array of users , who like recipe

createdAt.description: The date and time the recipe was created

updatedAt.description: The date and time the recipe was last changed

measure.description: The amount of ingredient needed to make the recipe

ingredients.description: An array of ingredients needed to prepare a recipe

owner.description: The unique identifier of the user who added the recipe
